duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct methodical evaluation of system capabilities relative to business needs, and translate to actionable technical specifications for the software development team.
Identify and assess technology solutions with an understanding of both technical and operational dependencies.
Articulate business and technical needs as functional and non-functional user stories.
Coordinate and participate in User Acceptance Testing (UAT).
Analyze and validate complex data sets using SQL.
Serve as a supporting subject matter expert, providing timely, pertinent information to other squad members and/or business partners.
Develop artifacts that support efficient and effective solution delivery, such as user stories, process maps/workflows, and system diagrams.
Identify and respond to production incidents/issues, including validation, scope, impact, and urgency.
Guide key integration decisions, drive solutions, and collaborate with technology partners.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
